• Step 3 - Control the Customer Journey with Marketing Automation Plans

    In this step the visitor has been placed in a Marketing Automation plan to help control the customer journey for new contact acquisitions.

    The Marketing Automation plan will check visitor consent information and will only re-market if consent has been given. If no consent has been given we remove the contact from the Marketing Automation plan and place them on a contact list for later use.

    The goal of the Marketing Automation plan is to direct visitors to complete other goals on the website. The follow up goals involve completing a 3-step questionnaire and creating a new account in order to gather more information about the visitor.

    You can review the plan by going to the Marketing Automation app on the Sitecore dashboard. The Marketing Automation plan is named New Contact - Onboarding Customer Journey.
